title: ERROR p2p: could not retrieve subnets: missing ENR key "attnets"
body:
# üêû Bug Report

Hello, the following p2p error makes the logs unreadable. 

### Description

```
[2020-05-20 12:08:49] ERROR p2p: could not retrieve subnets: missing ENR key "attnets"
[2020-05-20 12:08:49] ERROR p2p: could not retrieve subnets: missing ENR key "attnets"
```

### Has this worked before in a previous version?

Yes.

## üî¨ Minimal Reproduction

Seeing this on all my Schlesi and Witti nodes.

## üî• Error

![Screenshot at 2020-05-20 12-10-13](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/58883403/82434295-f2585780-9a92-11ea-9c24-7ebfd5871260.png)

It would be nice to either fix this or move it to debug level. :pray:
@q9f Can you pull in the latest ? The fix was just merged in today #5917. I am closing this now, if you still see it please reopen the issue.
